title: Why Some Individuals Can’t ‘See’ Anything When They Close Their Eyes
description: Aphantasia is a condition in which a person cannot see or imagine mental images. In other words, when they attempt to imagine or think about something they cannot create an internal mental image or picture. While rare, it provides an intriguing window into the workings of the brain and mind.

title: Building 3D-Printed + Mass Manufactured Homes Is 50% Faster, Produces 99% Less Waste, And Can Be 80% Automated
